info.name: adkiller:Axfc UpLoader
info.description:
Axfc UpLoader(http://www.axfc.net/uploader/)用広告削除CSS

- - -その他のCSS
http://userstyles.org/users/4626

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("axfc.net") {
a[href^="http://oz.valueclick.ne.jp/"],
a[href^="http://www.accesstrade.net/"],
a[href^="http://ad2.trafficgate.net/"],
img[src^="http://adfarm.mediaplex.com/"],
iframe[src^="http://ck.jp.ap.valuecommerce.com/"],
iframe[src^="http://ad.jp.ap.valuecommerce.com/"],
iframe[src^="http://send.microad.jp/mad.cgi?"],
iframe[src^="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/"],
object[codebase^="https://download.macromedia.com/"]
{display: none !important;}}
